title: JSW Neo Energy bags 600 MW wind-solar hybrid project from MSEDCL
description: JSW Energy's subsidiary, JSW Neo Energy, has secured a 600 MW wind-solar hybrid power project from Maharashtra State Electricity Distribution Company. This boosts JSW Energy's total locked-in generation capacity to 18.2 GW. The company aims to reach an installed generation capacity of 10 GW by FY25 and achieve carbon neutrality by 2050.
